problem_names:
lemmas eval\<^sub>1_evals\<^sub>1_induct = eval\<^sub>1_evals\<^sub>1.induct [split_format (complete)]
  and eval\<^sub>1_evals\<^sub>1_inducts = eval\<^sub>1_evals\<^sub>1.inducts [split_format (complete)]

lemma eval\<^sub>1_preserves_len:
  "P \<turnstile>\<^sub>1 \<langle>e\<^sub>0,(h\<^sub>0,ls\<^sub>0)\<rangle> \<Rightarrow> \<langle>e\<^sub>1,(h\<^sub>1,ls\<^sub>1)\<rangle> \<Longrightarrow> length ls\<^sub>0 = length ls\<^sub>1"
and evals\<^sub>1_preserves_len:
  "P \<turnstile>\<^sub>1 \<langle>es\<^sub>0,(h\<^sub>0,ls\<^sub>0)\<rangle> [\<Rightarrow>] \<langle>es\<^sub>1,(h\<^sub>1,ls\<^sub>1)\<rangle> \<Longrightarrow> length ls\<^sub>0 = length ls\<^sub>1"

lemma evals\<^sub>1_preserves_elen:
  "\<And>es' s s'. P \<turnstile>\<^sub>1 \<langle>es,s\<rangle> [\<Rightarrow>] \<langle>es',s'\<rangle> \<Longrightarrow> length es = length es'"

lemma eval\<^sub>1_final: "P \<turnstile>\<^sub>1 \<langle>e,s\<rangle> \<Rightarrow> \<langle>e',s'\<rangle> \<Longrightarrow> final e'"
 and evals\<^sub>1_final: "P \<turnstile>\<^sub>1 \<langle>es,s\<rangle> [\<Rightarrow>] \<langle>es',s'\<rangle> \<Longrightarrow> finals es'"
translations:
lemmas eval\<^sub>1_evals\<^sub>1_induct = eval\<^sub>1_evals\<^sub>1.induct [split_format (complete)]
  and eval\<^sub>1_evals\<^sub>1_inducts = eval\<^sub>1_evals\<^sub>1.inducts [split_format (complete)]

lemma eval\<^sub>1_preserves_len:
  "P \<turnstile>\<^sub>1 \<langle>e\<^sub>0,(h\<^sub>0,ls\<^sub>0)\<rangle> \<Rightarrow> \<langle>e\<^sub>1,(h\<^sub>1,ls\<^sub>1)\<rangle> \<Longrightarrow> length ls\<^sub>0 = length ls\<^sub>1"
and evals\<^sub>1_preserves_len:
  "P \<turnstile>\<^sub>1 \<langle>es\<^sub>0,(h\<^sub>0,ls\<^sub>0)\<rangle> [\<Rightarrow>] \<langle>es\<^sub>1,(h\<^sub>1,ls\<^sub>1)\<rangle> \<Longrightarrow> length ls\<^sub>0 = length ls\<^sub>1"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (P \<turnstile>\<^sub>1 \<langle>e\<^sub>0,
                             (h\<^sub>0, ls\<^sub>0)\<rangle> \<Rightarrow>
                            \<langle>e\<^sub>1,
                             (h\<^sub>1,
                              ls\<^sub>1)\<rangle> \<Longrightarrow>
     length ls\<^sub>0 = length ls\<^sub>1) &&&
    (P \<turnstile>\<^sub>1 \<langle>es\<^sub>0,
                             (h\<^sub>0,
                              ls\<^sub>0)\<rangle> [\<Rightarrow>]
                            \<langle>es\<^sub>1,
                             (h\<^sub>1,
                              ls\<^sub>1)\<rangle> \<Longrightarrow>
     length ls\<^sub>0 = length ls\<^sub>1)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (P \<turnstile>\<^sub>1 \<langle>e\<^sub>0,
                             (h\<^sub>0, ls\<^sub>0)\<rangle> \<Rightarrow>
                            \<langle>e\<^sub>1,
                             (h\<^sub>1,
                              ls\<^sub>1)\<rangle> \<Longrightarrow>
     length ls\<^sub>0 = length ls\<^sub>1) &&&
    (P \<turnstile>\<^sub>1 \<langle>es\<^sub>0,
                             (h\<^sub>0,
                              ls\<^sub>0)\<rangle> [\<Rightarrow>]
                            \<langle>es\<^sub>1,
                             (h\<^sub>1,
                              ls\<^sub>1)\<rangle> \<Longrightarrow>
     length ls\<^sub>0 = length ls\<^sub>1)

lemma evals\<^sub>1_preserves_elen:
  "\<And>es' s s'. P \<turnstile>\<^sub>1 \<langle>es,s\<rangle> [\<Rightarrow>] \<langle>es',s'\<rangle> \<Longrightarrow> length es = length es'"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>es' s s'.
       P \<turnstile>\<^sub>1 \<langle>es,s\<rangle> [\<Rightarrow>]
                              \<langle>es',s'\<rangle> \<Longrightarrow>
       length es = length es'

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>es' s s'.
       P \<turnstile>\<^sub>1 \<langle>es,s\<rangle> [\<Rightarrow>]
                              \<langle>es',s'\<rangle> \<Longrightarrow>
       length es = length es'

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>es' s s'.
       P \<turnstile>\<^sub>1 \<langle>[],s\<rangle> [\<Rightarrow>]
                              \<langle>es',s'\<rangle> \<Longrightarrow>
       length [] = length es'
 2. \<And>a list es' s s'.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>es' s s'.
                   P \<turnstile>\<^sub>1 \<langle>list,
     s\<rangle> [\<Rightarrow>]
    \<langle>es',s'\<rangle> \<Longrightarrow>
                   length list = length es';
        P \<turnstile>\<^sub>1 \<langle>a # list,s\<rangle> [\<Rightarrow>]
                               \<langle>es',s'\<rangle>\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> length (a # list) = length es'

lemma eval\<^sub>1_final: "P \<turnstile>\<^sub>1 \<langle>e,s\<rangle> \<Rightarrow> \<langle>e',s'\<rangle> \<Longrightarrow> final e'"
 and evals\<^sub>1_final: "P \<turnstile>\<^sub>1 \<langle>es,s\<rangle> [\<Rightarrow>] \<langle>es',s'\<rangle> \<Longrightarrow> finals es'"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (P \<turnstile>\<^sub>1 \<langle>e,s\<rangle> \<Rightarrow>
                            \<langle>e',s'\<rangle> \<Longrightarrow>
     final e') &&&
    (P \<turnstile>\<^sub>1 \<langle>es,s\<rangle> [\<Rightarrow>]
                            \<langle>es',s'\<rangle> \<Longrightarrow>
     finals es')

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (P \<turnstile>\<^sub>1 \<langle>e,s\<rangle> \<Rightarrow>
                            \<langle>e',s'\<rangle> \<Longrightarrow>
     final e') &&&
    (P \<turnstile>\<^sub>1 \<langle>es,s\<rangle> [\<Rightarrow>]
                            \<langle>es',s'\<rangle> \<Longrightarrow>
     finals es')
